annonstext:
We are looking for a passionate and experienced Product Managers to join our product teams in Stockholm, Sweden.

As a Product Manager you will work closely with a team of motivated and experienced engineers, building and developing Spotify's features. Together we try to find new ways to create a great Spotify experience for all our users at all times. Above all, your work will impact the way the world experiences music

Who you are

	You have experience working with product development and building consumer products together with cross functional teams
	You have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team
	You know how to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things done
	You can translate your and your team's knowledge and experience to user stories and prioritized backlog items
	You are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels, in different shapes depending on the context
	You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization, and in a variety of contexts
	You have experience with dataYou have experience with data driven product development and knowledge of agile methodologies
annonstextFormaterad:
We are looking for a passionate and experienced Product Managers to join our product teams in Stockholm, Sweden.

As a Product Manager you will work closely with a team of motivated and experienced engineers, building and developing Spotify's features. Together we try to find new ways to create a great Spotify experience for all our users at all times. Above all, your work will impact the way the world experiences music


Who you are

  • You have experience working with product development and building consumer products together with cross functional teams
  • You have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team
  • You know how to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things done
  • You can translate your and your team's knowledge and experience to user stories and prioritized backlog items
  • You are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels, in different shapes depending on the context
  • You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization, and in a variety of contexts
  • You have experience with dataYou have experience with data driven product development and knowledge of agile methodologies
